text:
@KarluskaP Following the White House press briefing on coronavirus Monday, it appears that ABC reporter Jon Karl gives a salute to Dr. Anthony Fauci, who returned the gesture with “finger guns.”

https://t.co/i6ggYzmzle https://t.co/aE1i2857Ua
